## arrayMax() function

Find the largest number in an array, if the array is empty the return is -Infinity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function arrayMax(numbers: ArrayLike<number>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  numbers | ArrayLike&lt;number&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
